file_content.text: Have the next Blacklist bounty's coordinates logged by the time I'm ready to head out.
Will do.
So, we on easy street now or what?
They'll be putting my face on wanted posters instead of advertisements.
Afraid not.
No, Mako blew it.
What'd they have to say?
Mostly they read me my rights.
"You're under arrest."
Genius here couldn't tell the offer was bogus.
Nothing good. Blame Mako.
The whole thing was a Republic setup.
It was a trap.
Nice job there.
I'm only taking flak from one person here, so can it.
Now that they've tipped their hand, it won't happen again. That's a promise.
Are we rich? Tell me we're rich!
There was no deal. It was a setup.
We aren't rich.
I hate to break it to you, but this was all a scam.
You want the good or bad news?
You're lucky I think you're too stupid to sell me out.
You messed up, bad.
The Republic was waiting to take me in for that attack on the Aurora.
What? But--how? That offer letter was one hundred percent legitimate. I traced it back to Adascorp and cross-checked all the digital signatures.
It wasn't a forgery. They were cooperating with the SIS.
That's because it was legit.
The Strategic Information Service? We have to be seriously careful to stay off their scanners.
It doesn't matter. We'll just have to be more careful in the future.
No harm done.
I'm really sorry. I won't let it happen again.
Looks like Bloodworthy's on the line. I'll patch him through.
You bring me an offer--be ready to stake your life on it.
I don't want excuses.
I--I will. I'm really sorry about this.
Hey, look. Bloodworthy's on the line... I'll patch him through.
Hope I'm not interrupting.
Just wanted to transfer your next target...that is, if you're ready for another Blacklist favorite.
Double or nothing?
This another wager?
Ha-ha. No wagers this time. Not between us, anyway.
Anytime.
Don't worry, we made sure to grab the ugliest mark on the list.
I'd hate to miss another chance to outdo you.
Hope your pride is up to it.
I was hoping you'd say that. Jewl'a bet you'd call it quits after the first one.
This bounty's years shy of beating Jicoln's time, but anything sitting on the Blacklist more than a month is real trouble.
I'm putting my money on you this time, so try not to get yourself killed.
What's our next move?
Get back to business.
We've got another Blacklist mark to deal with.
Back to work, everyone.
I've had my fill of Quesh. Let's find a place to put up our feet.
Call it a day.
I'm sure the Empire can find something for us to do while we're here.
Make the trip worth our while.
Boss! Boss famous now? Can Blizz have autograph?
Hey, the big people are trying to talk here.
Aww... Blizz sorry things not work out for boss. Blizz can put boss's face on things Blizz make if boss want.
I... appreciate the offer, little guy.
Thanks.
Blizz draw up prototypes for boss to look at!
That's stupid.
Blizz not ignorant, just trying to cheer boss up.
Ooh, wait! Blizz want to hear too!
Ooh, wait! Blizz want to hear too!
Boss going to be famous!
